scripts.postbuild: cp -r public .next/standalone/ && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/.next/ && cp server.ts .next/standalone/ && cp tsconfig.server.json .next/standalone/ && cp package.json .next/standalone/
scripts.start:detached: nohup npx tsx server.ts > /tmp/sync.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/sync.pid && echo "Started with PID $(cat /tmp/sync.pid)"
scripts.stop: if [ -f /tmp/sync.pid ]; then PID=$(cat /tmp/sync.pid); kill $PID 2>/dev/null || kill -9 $PID 2>/dev/null; rm /tmp/sync.pid 2>/dev/null; echo 'Stopped via PID file'; fi; if command -v lsof >/dev/null 2>&1; then lsof -ti:24680 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null && echo 'Killed via lsof' || true; fi; fuser -k 24680/tcp 2>/dev/null && echo 'Killed via fuser' || true; sleep 1; if lsof -i:24680 >/dev/null 2>&1 || fuser 24680/tcp >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Warning: Port may still be in use'; else echo 'Port 24680 is free'; fi
scripts.prod: pnpm build && PORT=24680 NODE_ENV=production pnpm start:detached
